overview: Photos of the Secretary of State having sex with her guards have been captured by kidnappers in order to blackmail her. The State Major therefore, calls upon Ethan, one of the best agents whose motivations are more sexual than moral, to find and destroy them. His mission is perilous; several people get in his way including Angelika, the Mantis, who is impossible to resist in Mission XXX Impossible.
title: Mission XXX Impossible
